DOC.brief_summary: OASIS Wound Matrix (Oasis) will be applied to wounds, with sequential biopsy of healing wounds to explore the mechanism of action.
DOC.brief_title: OASIS Wound Matrix (Oasis) Mechanism of Action
DOC.detailed_description: Wound types will be Diabetic Foot Ulcers (DFU) and Venous Stasis Ulcers (VSU).
DOC.criteria: Diabetic foot ulcer (DFU) or venous stasis ulcer (VSU) of the leg, with certain restrictions on size, duration and underlying health Contraindications or hypersensitivity to the use of the study medications or their components
